title: How do I check the status of my GCrypto order?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I use limit orders in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39911228301337-How-do-I-use-limit-orders-in-GCrypto)
- [How do I check the status of my GCrypto order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31307289104153-How-do-I-check-the-status-of-my-GCrypto-order)
- [How can I sell crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31306888871833-How-can-I-sell-crypto-in-GCrypto)
- [What are the minimum and maximum limits for an order in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31305985539865-What-are-the-minimum-and-maximum-limits-for-an-order-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I buy crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9781977718425-How-can-I-buy-crypto-in-GCrypto)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

You can check the status of your orders in the GCrypto Transaction page. Once your order is confirmed, it will be marked as ‘Successful.’

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41420554974489)**

Your funds will be available immediately after payment. However, during high trading volumes, it may take a little longer to process.

To view your crypto holdings, tap on **Portfolio.**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41420541963289)**

To verify your GCrypto transactions, check your Transaction History within the app or refer to the email notifications you receive.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:
